6.81b: Increased  Gust knockback duration from 0.5 to 0.6/0.7/0.8/0.9.
6.77c: Marksmanship No longer grants any agility when an enemy hero is within the radius, instead of being halved. Reduced enemy detection radius from 400 to 375.
6.00: Reduced  Frost Arrows movement speed slow from 15%/30%/40%/50% to 10%/20%/30%/40%.
6.53: Increased  Marksmanship agility bonus from 10/20/30 to 12/24/36.
6.84b: Reduced  Silence non-hero duration from 16/20/24/28 to 3/4/5/6.
6.36b: Increased base attack damage from 11-22 to 18-29 (total attack damage is now 40-51).
6.72d: Frost Arrows No longer slows attack speed. Increased movement speed slow from 10%/20%/30%/40% to 11%/24%/37%/50%.
6.79: Reduced night vision from 1700 to 800.  Precision Aura Increased ranged attack damage bonus from 16%/20%/24%/28% to 18%/24%/30%/36% of Drow Ranger's agility. No longer passively affects creeps within a 900 radius. Can now be manually cast to affect creeps globally for 30 seconds (120 seconds cooldown). Increased  Marksmanship enemy detection radius from 375 to 400.
6.78: Increased  Precision Aura ranged attack damage bonus from 14%/18%/22%/26% to 16%/20%/24%/28% of Drow Ranger's agility.
6.84c: Precision Aura no longer passively affects Creep-Heroes within a 900 radius around Drow Ranger (still affects them globally when activated).
6.50: Reduced  agility gain from 2.9 to 1.9. Increased  Precision Aura radius from 400 to 900. Reworked  Marksmanship
6.75: Increased  Frost Arrows movement speed slow from 11%/24%/37%/50% to 11%/24%/37%/60%. Reduced  Silence cooldown from 15 to 13. Increased  Precision Aura ranged attack damage bonus from 7%/14%/21%/28% to 8%/16%/24%/32%. Increased  Marksmanship agility bonus from 15/30/45 to 15/30/60.
6.77: Precision Aura Can no longer be toggled to affect creeps globally. Now passively affects creeps only within a 900 radius.
6.76c: Reduced base armor from -1 to -3 (total armor is now 0.64). Increased  Marksmanship enemy detection radius from 375 to 400.
6.58: Increased  Marksmanship agility bonus from 12/24/36 to 15/30/45.
6.81: Increased  Gust knockback duration from 0.2 to 0.5.
6.82: Increased  Frost Arrows movement speed slow from 11%/24%/37%/60% to 15%/30%/45%/60%.
6.83: Marksmanship now fully works for illusions. Just like the original, illusions lose the bonus once an enemy hero comes too close.
